name: py-pre-commit
description:
A framework for managing and maintaining multi-language pre-commit
hooks.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cfgv
dependencies.description: Validate configuration and produce human readable error messages.

dependencies.name: py-identify
dependencies.description:
File identification library for Python. Given a file (or some
information about a file), return a set of standardized tags identifying
what the file is.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-toml
dependencies.description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git

dependencies.name: py-virtualenv
dependencies.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.

dependencies.name: py-futures
dependencies.description: Backport of the concurrent.futures package from Python 3.2
